summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney to attorney Jack Scarola regarding a recent court order from Judge Nathan about Local Criminal Rule 23.1, which applies to counsel of record and associated attorneys in criminal cases. The email includes an attachment of the order and provides contact information for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Jack Scarola
persons.context: Recipient of an email from an Assistant United States Attorney regarding a court order on Local Criminal Rule 23.1.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: Issued an order regarding Local Criminal Rule 23.1, which is referenced in the email.

events.title: Order Regarding Local Criminal Rule 23.1
events.description: Judge Nathan issued an order regarding Local Criminal Rule 23.1, which applies to counsel of record and associated attorneys in criminal cases.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Judge Nathan issued an order regarding Local Criminal Rule 23.1 on or around July 30, 2021.
The rule applies not only to counsel of record but also to attorneys associated with a case, such as attorneys for witnesses.
The email is correspondence from an Assistant United States Attorney to attorney Jack Scarola about this legal procedural matter.
